item.title: Creating custom cards for Home Assistant
item.description:
The goal of this post is to give you a brief introduction to creating custom cards for Home Assistant using Lit elements, and I will share with you takeaways from my experience learning how to create custom cards for Home Assistant.

Home Assistant is a powerful, open-source, extensible (and much more) platform for home automation. If you are using it, You probably are a fan of the dashboards, and the cards are one of the most important parts of it.
